item.title: CVE-2024-1095|2024-06-04T17:59:31.199Z -- razib_ -- build%20%26%20control%20block%20patterns%20%E2%80%93%20boost%20up%20gutenberg%20editor
item.description: The Build & Control Block Patterns â€“ Boost up Gutenberg Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the settings_export() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.5.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export the plugin's settings.
